Your Gateway to Foreign Employment Opportunities

Connecting Ethiopian talent with trusted employers across the Middle East.

About Durrat Agency

Our Mission

At Durrat Foreign Employment Agency, our mission is to connect skilled Ethiopian workers with reputable employers worldwide, ensuring safe, legal, and dignified employment opportunities while contributing to Ethiopia's economic growth through remittances and skills development.

Our Vision

We aim to be the leading employment agency in Ethiopia, known for our integrity, professionalism, and commitment to our candidates' success and wellbeing. We envision a future where Ethiopian talent is recognized and valued in the global workforce.

Our Services

We provide comprehensive employment services to help you secure rewarding opportunities abroad.

Job Placement

We match your skills with suitable positions in reputable companies across various countries.

Visa Processing

Our team handles the complete visa application process, ensuring smooth documentation.

Pre-departure Training

Comprehensive orientation on work culture, language basics, and practical skills for your destination.

Contract Negotiation

We ensure fair employment contracts with transparent terms and competitive salaries.

Travel Arrangements

Assistance with flight bookings and coordination with employers for smooth arrivals.

Post-placement Support

Ongoing assistance and support throughout your employment period abroad.

Our International Partners

Destination Countries

We connect Ethiopian talent with opportunities in these key countries, each offering unique benefits and career paths.

Maid in Jordan
